This allows you to manage all PC stations centrally from one computer (e.g. ","What components are listed in the reserves overview for SIMATIC PCS 7, and what is their licensing range?","Components include ES, OS, AS, Archiving, SIMATIC BATCH stations, Route Control stations, Maintenance station, PDM, and SIMATIC PCS 7 BOX, each with specific licensing ranges.","The overview lists ES (250-unlimited PO), OS (250-12,000 PO), AS (100-3000 PO), Archiving (<512-8x5000 tags), SIMATIC BATCH (1-unlimited units), Route Control (10-300 routes), Maintenance station (128-unlimited tags), PDM (4-unlimited tags), and SIMATIC PCS 7 BOX (250-2000 PO).","Key components are Engineering system, Operator stations, Automation system, Archiving, SIMATIC BATCH, Route Control, Maintenance station, PDM, and SIMATIC PCS 7 BOX, with varied licensing levels.","The reserves overview covers multiple components like ES, OS, AS, and others, detailing their respective licensing limits.","For SIMATIC PCS 7, components such as ES, OS, and AS are monitored, with licensing ranges from 250 to unlimited POs for ES, for example."
